title: Галыгин.Ру
overview:
The main character - Vadik, works in a stand-up comedy show and conducts corporate events. Each episode is a separate story that takes place with Vadik and his friends, whose life is full of funny situations and unexpected adventures.
The show combines incompatible things: sitcom, "stand up comedy" and reality show. Each episode is preceded by an epigraph that briefly and succinctly describes its content.
